title: Pantries, Online Payments Accepted, Built-In Microwaves
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Avion at Sunrise Mountain', 'Welcome to Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments located on beautiful Sunrise Mountain in Northeast Las Vegas, Nevada.', 'Avion sits high atop the city of lights and offers spectacular views of both downtown and the fabulous Las Vegas Strip.', 'Avion offers the convenience of urban living and the quiet atmosphere found usually in suburban neighborhoods.', 'Residents of Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments enjoy first class amenities including two sparkling pools and luxurious outdoor spa tubs, 24-hour access fitness center, business center and tot-lot.', 'The individual homes are equipped with modern electric appliances, roman soaking tubs and architectural features that truly set Avion apart from other communities.', 'Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments soars above the competition and is a place that you can be proud to call home.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 43', 'OR Text', '43', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1167 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- View', '- Built-In Microwaves', '- Pantries', '- Refrigerator', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Full size washer/dryer connections', 'Community Amenities', '- Clubhouse', '- 24 Hour Fitness Room (ask for details)', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Business center', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- Two Sparkling Swimming Pools', '- Tot Lot', '- Spa', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Professional Management', 'Pet Policy', 'Cat and Dogs under 40 lb', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday Sunday 10:00am - 5:00pm', 'Avion at Sunrise Mountain', '6901 E. Lake Mead Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89156', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'mRgf6pGgtsD9']
